How to play Three in a Row?\nThe object of the game is to avoid three in a row of the same colour square horizontally or vertically. \nEach time you click a grey square, the colour will alternate between colour 1 and colour 2.
When you make it to the end of the game without getting 3 in a row, you have won the game and the completed board will look something like this:

Settings.\nYou can change the settings to customize your experience. Simply click on the spinner for the setting you want to change and set the value. Press the Save Settings Button to save your values. Colour 1 and Colour 2 cannot be the same colour!
